description:
Tsubuyakky and Suzukky head to the Asuka period in 607 to find Prince Shotoku. Bimajo has been gone for a week and both of them felt rather unmotivated, but then they find Prince Shotoku’s Dynamond. Of course, Tokio and Calen show up but then Bimajo shows up with them! Prince Shotoku then holds a popularity contest to see who will get the Dynamond.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ano Seitoku Taishi ga Kimeru Kakuzuke Ranking "Bokan`i Juunikai"! Soshite Bimajo no Yukue wa!?
The Ranking That Prince Shotoku Came Up With: The Twelve Bokan Ranking System! And What Will Become of Bimajo?!
あの聖徳太子が決める格付けランキング『ボ冠位十二階』! そしてビマージョの行方は!?
